item.name: Jace Beleren
item.text: +2: Each player draws a card. -1: Target player draws a card. -10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Martyr of Frost
item.text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
item.flavorText: "Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Fathom Seer
item.text: Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

item.name: Voidmage Apprentice
item.text: Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

item.name: Wall of Deceit
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down. Morph {U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Willbender
item.text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

item.name: Bottle Gnomes
item.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: Reinforcements . . . or refreshments?

item.name: Man-o'-War
item.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

item.name: Ophidian
item.text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

item.name: Fledgling Mawcor
item.text: Flying {T}: Fledgling Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Morph {U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Waterspout Djinn
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Fly us higher, out of its storm." —Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

item.name: Mulldrifter
item.text: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.name: Air Elemental
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

item.name: Guile
item.text: Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

item.name: Riftwing Cloudskate
item.text: Flying When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand. Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Spire Golem
item.text: Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.) Flying
item.flavorText: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

item.name: Æthersnipe
item.text: When Æthersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.name: Brine Elemental
item.text: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.
item.flavorText: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

item.name: Quicksilver Dragon
item.text: Flying {U}: If target spell has only one target and that target is Quicksilver Dragon, change that spell's target to another creature. Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Errant Ephemeron
item.text: Flying Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Ancestral Vision
item.text: Ancestral Vision is blue. Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Target player draws three cards.

item.name: Mind Stone
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?" —Jhoira, master artificer

item.name: Daze
item.text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

item.name: Counterspell
item.text: Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

item.name: Repulse
item.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "You aren't invited."

item.name: Fact or Fiction
item.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

item.name: Gush
item.text:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Gush's mana cost.
Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

item.name: Condescend
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Terrain Generator
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Chandra Nalaar
item.text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player. -X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. -8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

item.name: Flamekin Brawler
item.text: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: When he hits people, they stay hit.

item.name: Fireslinger
item.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
item.flavorText: "Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation." —Karn, silver golem

item.name: Soulbright Flamekin
item.text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

item.name: Pyre Charger
item.text: Haste {R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

item.name: Slith Firewalker
item.text: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
item.flavorText: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

item.name: Flamewave Invoker
item.text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things—and far worse.

item.name: Inner-Flame Acolyte
item.text: When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.name: Flametongue Kavu
item.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." —Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

item.name: Furnace Whelp
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

item.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
item.text: {R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

item.name: Ingot Chewer
item.text: When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
item.flavorText: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

item.name: Oxidda Golem
item.text: Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.) Haste
item.flavorText: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

item.name: Chartooth Cougar
item.text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Hostility
item.text: Haste If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

item.name: Firebolt
item.text: Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
item.flavorText: Reach out and torch someone.

item.name: Seal of Fire
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: After the fourth time Chandra left a place engulfed in flames, she decided to just go ahead and make it her thing.

item.name: Incinerate
item.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
item.flavorText: "Who said there are no assurances in life? I assure you this is going to hurt."

item.name: Magma Jet
item.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Flame Javelin
item.text: ({2R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.) Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

item.name: Cone of Flame
item.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

item.name: Fireblast
item.text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

item.name: Fireball
item.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
item.flavorText: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

item.name: Demonfire
item.text: Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

item.name: Keldon Megaliths
item.text: Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.text: R
